About us
Shenzhen Dongjilian Medical Tech Co., LTD. was founded in 2003, which is a leading professional high-tech enterprise specialized in the design, development, production and marketing of electronic massagers and health care products.
Our main electronic massagers are portable smart massage cushion and foot massagers. Our main health care products are Low Frequency Therapy and Air Pressure Therapy Devices. Dongjilian has a long history as a manufacturer of electronic massagers and health care products in China.
Our R & D team is made of 30 engineers, support to new products developing and OEM & ODM service; 10-30 new items are launched each year.
Our sales team is made of 30 sales, to cover the domestic and oversea market, we own brand â€�CINCOMâ€� which is popular in shopping mall and pharmacy in Domestic; besides, our products also have been exported to over 40 countries throughout the world, mainly in North America, Europe and Asia. Lots of certificate, such as ISO9001, ISO13485, FDA, UL, FCC, CE, ROHS certificate are obtained
We own 17000 square meters factory with 20 production line & 150,000pcs production capacity per month, and 500 employees.We possess the completed advanced production, testing equipment and professional laboratory in the massage industry.
Our Dongjilian team is always happy to help ! You can send them an email at vivien@dongjilian.com, call +86 135 1087 5156 or chat with them live during our normal business hours of Monday to Friday 9am-6pm PST .
Locations
B1/1-5F, Tonglu Industrial Area, 70# Tongxin Road, Tongxin Community, Longgang District, Shenzhen 518116, Guangdong, China

Shenzhen Dongjilian Medical Tech Co., LTD. was founded in 2003, which is a leading professional high-tech enterprise specialized in the design, development, production and marketing of electronic massagers and health care products.
Our main electronic massagers are portable smart massage cushion and foot massagers. Our main health care products are Low Frequency Therapy and Air Pressure Therapy Devices. Dongjilian has a long history as a manufacturer of electronic massagers and health care products in China.

We will continue to make every effort to satisfy our customers with the good quality products and services!
Since our company establish, we always follow the “Customer Oriented”, “Sincerity-Based”, “Quality First” business philosophy. “Health for Your Every Day” corporate slogan is not only Dongjilian People’s pursuit of human health care development, but also the driving force for enterprise development.

results.title: MUSE Design Awards | Healthcare Air Compression Th
results.content: China. This air therapy compression device is designed to give a solution for the increased detection rate of limb diseases. With the unique series design, the device has three components: leg, hand, and waist. The device is designed to provide targeted relief and treatment of limb diseases such as deep vein thrombosis, varicose veins, and poor ...
results.raw_content:
2022 | Professional
Air Compression Therapy Device
Entrant Company
Shenzhen Dongjilian Medical Tech Co., Ltd.
Category
Product Design - Healthcare
Client's Name
Shenzhen Dongjilian Medical Tech Co., Ltd.
Country / Region
China
Share :
This air therapy compression device is designed to give a solution for the increased detection rate of limb diseases. With the unique series design, the device has three components: leg, hand, and waist. The device is designed to provide targeted relief and treatment of limb diseases such as deep vein thrombosis, varicose veins, and poor blood circulation based on the concept of " limb diseases prevention first".
Different from conventional limb therapy devices with monotonous massage functions, the design of this series of products reflects professionalism in the field of physiotherapy. The device zoned a body with the three components for the legs, hands, and waist, which is based on the body part
vulnerable to diseases. And the device offers different massage for different parts of the body to ensure professional massage. Meanwhile, each component has a built-in intermittent pneumatic compression (IPC) device, which enables the user’s limb to be fully wrapped. With multiple air pressures and multi-stage pressure settings, the device allows the user to massage different areas of the limb at a realistic level according to their needs.
Intermittent pressure is applied to promote blood flow back to the limb and relieve muscle fatigue, thus providing prevention and relief. The multiple heating modules are reproduced to warm during the massage, which further optimizes the massage. To avoid over-massaging, the product is also equipped with an automatic shut-off function, which is automatically switched off after 30 minutes of operation to avoid damage to the user's limbs.
Additionally, the design of the device is user-friendly. The color LCD display on the main control unit allows the user to visualize the real-time massage status and to adjust the heating and massage modes that can be adjusted freely through the simple control buttons. The user can also access massage information via the accompanying app and customize the massage solution.

results.title: MUSE Design Awards | Personal Care (NEW) Hand Massager
results.content: Hand Massager by Shenzhen Dongjilian Medical Tech Co., Ltd. for Shenzhen Dongjilian Medical Tech Co., Ltd. | Category: Product Design - Personal Care (NEW) | MUSE Awards. IAA Partners : MUSE Awards . MUSE Creative Awards; MUSE Design Awards; ... The product also has a massage roller ball and palm-heating feature to strengthen the effect of therapy.
results.raw_content:
2022 | Professional
Hand Massager
Entrant Company
Shenzhen Dongjilian Medical Tech Co., Ltd.
Category
Product Design - Personal Care (NEW)
Client's Name
Shenzhen Dongjilian Medical Tech Co., Ltd.
Country / Region
China
Share :
Contemporary people use their hands quite regularly, yet are prone to neglect hand care. This product is created to raise the awareness of hand maintenance among contemporary people who use their hands regularly. With a innovative structure that breaks away from the homogenized design of other similar products on the market, this hand massager can accelerate blood circulation and relieve hand fatigue and muscle stiffness by applying hot compress and acupressure.
Different from conventional hand massagers, the product is equipped with an upper and lower airbags inside the device. Combined with a three-section air circuit, it ensures full contact with the palm of the hand to achieve better massage effect in each area of the palm and other parts of the hand that are difficult to attend to such as fingers, the heart of the hand, the back of the hand and the area between the thumb and the index finger. The product also has a massage roller ball and palm-heating feature to strengthen the effect of therapy.
The control panel of the massager is a lens-like touch screen with concise illustrations and a user-friendly interactive system. Users can easily view the work status and remaining power the device, and adjust the massage mode, time and frequency according to their needs.
In addition, the integrated shape design and the rechargeable feature make the product easily portable, enabling users to carry it around and have a hand massage during fragmented times.

DXC Technology Co - Company Profile
Powered by
All the data and insights you need on DXC Technology Co in one report.
DXC Technology Co: Overview
DXC Technology Co (DXC) is an information technology (IT) and consulting services provider. The company’s service portfolio includes analytics, cloud applications, cloud infrastructure, enterprise applications, data security services, IT outsourcing (ITO), and workplace and mobility solutions. Its solutions are primarily focused on minimizing business risks and operational costs for clients. DXC caters to the insurance, healthcare and life sciences, aerospace and defense, consumer and retail, manufacturing and automotive, travel and transportation, hospitality, energy, utilities, oil and gas, technology, media and telecommunications, public, banking, and capital sectors. The company’s operations are spread across various regions including the Americas, Australia, and Europe. DXC is headquartered in Ashburn, Virginia, the US.

Bloomberg Wall Street Week
Bloomberg Wall Street Week, hosted by David Westin, is a reinvention of the iconic Wall Street Week, which aired on PBS for over 30 years and was hosted by late financial journalist Louis Rukeyser. The one-hour program features market and geopolitical discussions with a rotating panel of influential voices including thought leaders, CEOs, policy makers and economists.
